post.summary:
Request for creating a new session.
Session is created with default drawing board page.
Body description:
Description: string, optional. The name of the session. If null - then session will be created with current date as a name.
ContentNameParts: (array of objects, required for displaying session name in json format in reports)
Order: integer, required. The order of question.
Question: string, required. The answered question.
Answer: string, required. The answer for the question.

ContentId.description: Unique id of the session within the system

MessageId.description: Unique id of chat message within the system

FormsId.description: The list of Ids of attached forms.

FolderId.description: The id of the session folder.

ContentNameParts.description: Array of objects, required for displaying session name in json format in reports (if session name created using naming convention).

NewOwnerId.description: The id of user, for whom session is switched.

UserId.description: The id of the user to be removed from the session.

FirstName.description: A form creator user first name.

LastName.description: A form creator user last name.

SessionsNumber.description: A number of sessions where current form is attached.

AnswersNumber.description: A total number of answers given in current form in all sessions.

IsPublished.description:
Indicates that form is not created by current user, but published by tenant admin.
Published forms are available for every user of this tenant.

Order.description: An order of the tab in current tab panel.
An order of the tab panel in the form.

Tabs.description: A list of tabs in current panel.

Solution.description:
A main information used by triggered condition action. 
For AttachForm condition - FormId, SendEmail - additional text in email, AddVideoByUrl - Video Url, ShowInfoMessage - info message. 
Optional for SendEmail condition.

TriggerValue.description: An answer value that trigger condition action (For textbox and textarea).

TriggerType.description: Trigger mode for numeric answer value.

Order.description: An order of the option in current control.

Conditions.description: A list of actions that can be triggered by selecting current option (for Dropdown, Checkbox or Radiobutton control).

Type.description: An additional information content type (image, video).

FileName.description: An additional information content file name.

ThumbnailUrl.description: An additional information content thumnail url (For video files only).

EncodedUrl.description: An additional information content encoded url (For video files only).

Tooltip.description: An informational text displayed when hovering over the control.

Placeholder.description: A hint text for possible content in control field.

InitialValue.description: A default answer for current question (For textbox and textarea only).

Options.description: A list of control options (For dropdown, checkbox and radiobutton).

Type.description: Specific question type. By default - Basic

Order.description: An order of the current question in the form.

Conditions.description: A list of actions that can be triggered by answering current question (for Textbox or Textarea control).

ExternalData.description: An external information related to current control (Id or any other information).

CounterLimit.description: A counter limit. Can be used to trigger counter conditions when exceeded. If null - unlimited.

CountAIObjects.description: Indicates whether the counter should count AI class unique objects or not.

Order.description: An order of the current counter in the form.

Conditions.description: A list of actions that can be triggered by exceeding counter limit.

Order.description: An order of the current action in the form.

Tooltip.description: An informational text displayed when hovering over the action.

Tabspanels.description: A list of tabs panels. Each tab panel contains at least one tab.

Controls.description: A list of form questions. Required if Counters list is empty.

Counters.description: A list of AI counters. Required if Controls list is empty.

Actions.description: A list of form actions. Required if Controls list is empty.

FormViewMode.description: A view mode for mobile users.

ExternalData.description: An external information related to current form (Id or any other information).

ContentId.description: Unique id of the session within the system

FolderId.description: Unique id of the session folder within the system

Url.description:
Url to file
Only links to collaborate blob storage are supported (can be received via api/uploads)

FolderId.description: Unique id of the session folder within the system

ContentId.description: Unique id of the session within the system

FolderId.description: Unique id of the session folder within the system

ContentId.description: Unique id of the session within the system

FolderId.description: Unique id of the session folder within the system

PageIds.description: List of pages ids, from which 360 view will be created

ContentId.description: Unique id of the session within the system

FolderId.description: Unique id of the session folder within the system

Url.description:
Url to pdf
Only links to collaborate blob storage are supported (can be received via api/uploads)

ContentId.description: Unique id of the session within the system

FolderId.description: Unique id of the session folder within the system

Id.description: Unique if of the page within the system

FolderId.description: Id of the folder to which the pages are moved

TimePeriod.description:
Time period for which the report is generated
If missing, then data for all time is returned.

ContentId.description: Unique id of the session within the system

Latest.description: Parameter for defining whether only the latest answers or the whole history of answers will be returned

Id.description: Unique id of form answer within the system

ContentId.description: Unique id of the session within the system

SessionOwner.description: Email of the user who created a session or was switched to be an owner by an Admin

SessionTitle.description: Name of the session assigned by the system automatically or changed by the user manually

FormId.description: Unique id of the form within the system

FormName.description: Name of the form assigned by the system automatically or changed by the user manually

FormQuestionId.description: Unique id of the question within the system

FormQuestion.description: Text of the question in a form

FormTabs.description: Name of section combinations inside a form in which form answer was given (e.g. Form has 5 questions and 2 tabs named "Now" and "In the Past". I.e. 5 questions can be answered for tab "Now" and same 5 for tab "In the past" (totally = 10 unique form answers)

FormAnswers.description: Text of the answer to particular form question

Replies.description: Text of additional comments left for a form answer

AnsweringUserEmail.description: Email of the user who gave a particular answer to a particular form question

FormAnswerTime.description: Exact day and time (in UTC) when a particular answer to a particular form question was given

FormAnswerStatusTime.description: Exact day and time (in UTC) when the status of a particular answer to a particular form question was changed

FormAnswerStatusApprover.description: Email of the user who changed the status of a particular answer to a particular form question

FormAnswerStatus.description: Current status of a particular form answer

PageUrl.description: URL to the page on which a particular answer to a particular form question was given

PageSize.description: Size of the page on which a particular answer to a particular form question was given (in megabytes)

Latitude.description: GPS latitude of the page on which a particular answer to a particular form question was given (if GPS data is present in a page)

Longitude.description: GPS longitude of the page on which a particular answer to a particular form question was given (if GPS data is present in a page)

StartDate.description:
Start date
Default value: 15 minutes before the current time.

GetReportTimePeriod.description:
Time period for which the report is generated
If missing, then data for the latest 15 minutes is returned.

TenantId.description:
Id of the tenant for which report is generated
If missing, then data for users tenant is returned.

ContentId.description: Unique id of the session within the system

SessionTitle.description: Name of the session assigned by the system automatically or changed by the user manually

ActionUser.description: Email of the user who performs an action

ActionType.description: Specific action which is performed by the user

ActionTime.description: Exact day and time (in UTC) when action was performed

ContentId.description: Unique id of the session within the system

Title.description: Name of the session assigned by the system automatically or changed by the user manually

Owner.description: Email of the user who created a session or was switched to be an owner by an Admin

CreatedOn.description: Exact day and time (in UTC) when a particular session was created

LastActivity.description: Exact day and time (in UTC) when last time an image or video was uploaded to the session by web/mobile session participants or form answer status was updated by web session owner or video call was started by web/mobile session owner

Length.description: The difference between "LastActivity" and "CreatedOn" in "dd:hh:mm" format

DaysActive.description: Number of unique image or video upload days (e.g. session of 5 days length, 1st day - 5 images and/or photos uploaded, 2nd - none, 3rd day - 1 image and/or photo uploaded, 4th, 5th days - none. "Days Active" = 2)

Pages.description: Total amount of all pages of all types in the session

Videos.description: Amount of videos (URL videos, recorded videos, custom videos included) uploaded to the session by web/mobile session participants

Images.description: Amount of images (snapshots included) uploaded to the session by web/mobile session participants

ApprovedPercent.description: Percentage of approved statuses among the latest form answer statuses from all forms currently attached to the session (100 x "Approved" / Total)

RejectedPercent.description: Percentage of rejected statuses among the latest form answer statuses from all forms currently attached to the session (100 x "Rejected" / Total)

PendingPercent.description: Percentage of pending statuses among the latest form answer statuses from all forms currently attached to the session (100 x "Submitted" / Total)

Total.description: Total amount of form questions within all forms which are currently attached to the session (tab combinations included, i.e. question is multiplied by the amount of tab combinations if the latter are present, e.g. 3 questions in a form with 2 tabs will have 6 questions in total)

Approved.description: Amount of "Approved" statuses among the latest form answer statuses from all forms currently attached to the session

Rejected.description: Amount of "Rejected" statuses among the latest form answer statuses from all forms currently attached to the session

Pending.description: Amount of "Submitted" statuses among the latest form answer statuses from all forms currently attached to the session

NoAction.description: Amount of "No Action" statuses among the latest form answer statuses from all forms currently attached to the session

NameDetails.description: Json which represents SessionTitle created via Session Naming Convention and is comprised of [{"Question":"First question","Answer: "First answer"}]

Id.description: Unique id of the session folder within the system

UserId.description: Unique id of the user within the system

ParentId.description: Unique id of parent session folder within the system

DocumentId.description: Unique id of document within the system

ContentId.description: Unique id of the session within the system

ParentId.description: Unique id of parent session folder within the system

Id.description: Unique id of the session folder within the system

content_id.description: Session id, if token created for concrete session

ExternalAccessToken.description: Access token of user in Nest system

extended_rights.description: Indicates if the Nest user has extended rights

content_id.description: Session id, if token created for concrete session

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme.
